Leadership (Board & Administration)

Administrative Services

Administrative Services

Administrative Services provides financial services, including accounting, cashiering, student payment plans, budget development, auxiliary services (bookstore and food services), facilities (maintenance, grounds, custodial, security, motorpool), and central services (mail, receiving, printing), purchasing, and inventory.

Annual Financial Reports

The accounts of Centralia College are maintained in accordance with policies and regulations established by Washington State and its Office of Financial Management.

The Annual Financial Reports are prepared in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles, following the guidance of the Governmental Accounting Standards Board.
